name: Shaymin

passive.name: Flower Gift
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may draw a card. Your opponent may also draw a card.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.effect: Remove all damage counters and special conditions from Shaymin. Shaymin is now asleep. You cannot use Rest next turn.

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches one of their Benched Pokemon with a new Active Pokemon. If they do, the new Active Pokemon is now asleep.

flavor: It just wants to hang out with its friends. There's no need to fight, let's all take a nice nap.
